context: Hello! What kind of movies are you looking for?
I like all sorts of films
I especially like family films like Frozen (2013) or The Princess and the Frog to watch with kids Anything exciting really What do you recommend for me to watch?
Oh I loved Frozen (2013) ! Moana (2016) was great as well if you havent seen it. Songs were very catchy
I also last Fast & Furious (2009) Yes Moana is great! I will definitely watch it again Any other suggestions for me? I also like Up (2009)
resp: One of my favorites is Stardust (2007) , it could be watched with older children
